headline: Anthropic’s Battle With President Trump Over AI Weapons Needs to Be ‘Resolved Quickly’
summary: Anthropic promised to fight its banning by the War Department in an argument over the future of autonomous systems and weapons for military use.

headline: 'Silent failure at scale': The AI risk that can tip the business world into disorder
summary: As AI systems become more complex the risk of surpassing human comprehension, not intelligence, could lead to chaos, artificial intelligence experts warn.

headline: Palantir And Rackspace Team Up To Target Regulated AI Deployments
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) and Rackspace Technology announced a new partnership focused on accelerating enterprise use of Palantir’s AI and Foundry platforms. The collaboration is aimed at sectors with strict data sovereignty and compliance needs, combining Palantir’s software with Rackspace’s migration, hosting, and managed services. For investors following enterprise AI, this move highlights how Palantir is working to scale its software into heavily regulated industries where...

headline: UBS Sees Palantir (PLTR) Positioned at Center of AI and Software Spending Boom
summary: Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) is included among the 13 Best Performing Long Term Stocks to Invest in. On February 27, UBS upgraded Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) to Buy from Neutral. The firm set a $180 price target on the stock. UBS said the upgrade reflects the stock’s valuation after a 35% decline from its peak. […]

headline: Jim Cramer Believes “Palantir Is a Very Long-Term Hold”
summary: Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under the microscope. A caller asked if they should buy, sell, or hold the stock, and here’s what Cramer had to say in response: Oh, look, I like Palantir, but Palantir is a very long-term hold. It’s way ahead of itself.
